title: Manage a Fueling Discrepancy
description: After fueling, the pilot notices the fuel quantity indicated in the cockpit does not match the amount on the fueler's receipt.

tasks.description: The pilot notifies the ground crew of the discrepancy.
The ground crew and pilot re-verify the fuel order and the amount shown on the fuel truck's meter.
If a discrepancy still exists, a maintenance technician is called to troubleshoot the aircraft's fuel quantity indication system.
tasks.expected_outcome: A technician is called to diagnose a potential fault with the aircraft's gauges.
